rhinoshield.title: RhinoShield
rhinoshield.desc: The official online store of the well-known mobile phone case brand, RhinoShield, is famous for its durable case and customized services. The store also has flexible product preview modes that lets customers mix and match their own phone case.
rhinoshield.tech_list: Vue.js / Nuxt.js / JavaScript / TypeScript / Sass / SCSS / HTML / Shopify API / Liquid

trip_app.title: Travel Itinerary App
trip_app.desc: When I was planning a travel itinerary, the driver said he wants the address of spot instead of the google map. That's why this app was created. Base on easily use and quick build this app, I use Google sheet as the data base so everyone can edit the itinerary easily. The app just need to call the Google App Script that I have written to get the data and display the itinerary in the app.
trip_app.tech_list: Vue Cli / Vuex / Vue Router / Google App Script / SASS / HTML

intro.desc:
I'm a kind and energetic person. On the job, I am responsible and diligent. I hold a Bachelor's degree with a major in Department of Information and Communication which was awarded to me by Yuan Ze University. Influenced by the school, I am interested in information and technology. I like to get a sense of accomplishment from my works, and I am also willing to learn new front-end technologies.

After graduation, I had been working as a front-end developer for almost 4 years in RhinoShield, which has one of the well-known mobile phone case brand in Taiwan. My duties was developing and maintaining official online stores of 11 countries, includes Taiwan, France, Germany, etc. In addition to improving front-end skills, I also gained a lot of experience that made me become more independent.

Different from other engineers, I care more about user experience and the visual. I think that's the difference form front-end and other developers. I put myself into making websites and apps which have a good user experience.
